Typealiases.html#/s:4E3db10E3dbResult.name: E3dbResult
Typealiases.html#/s:4E3db10E3dbResult.abstract: A type that contains either a value of type T or an E3dbError

Typealiases.html#/s:4E3db14E3dbCompletio.abstract: A completion handler that operates on an E3dbResult<T> type,

Typealiases.html#/s:4E3db9PlainMeta.name: PlainMeta
Typealiases.html#/s:4E3db9PlainMeta.abstract: A type that holds arbitrary metadata for a record in cleartext

Structs/IncomingSharingPolicy.html#/s:vV.name: writerId
Structs/IncomingSharingPolicy.html#/s:vV.abstract: The identifier for the user sharing with the client

Structs/OutgoingSharingPolicy.html#/s:vV.name: readerId
Structs/OutgoingSharingPolicy.html#/s:vV.abstract: An identifier for a user with whom to share

Structs/ClientCredentials.html#/s:vV4E3d.name: apiKeyId
Structs/ClientCredentials.html#/s:vV4E3d.abstract: An identifier for the key for use with the E3db service

Structs/ClientCredentials.html#/s:vV4E3d.name: apiSecret
Structs/ClientCredentials.html#/s:vV4E3d.abstract: A secret to use with the E3db service

Structs/ClientCredentials.html#/s:vV4E3d.name: publicKey
Structs/ClientCredentials.html#/s:vV4E3d.abstract: The public key registered with the E3db service and used for encryption

Structs/ClientCredentials.html#/s:vV4E3d.name: enabled
Structs/ClientCredentials.html#/s:vV4E3d.abstract: A flag indicating whether this client is active

Structs/Record.html#/s:vV4E3db6Record4me.name: meta
Structs/Record.html#/s:vV4E3db6Record4me.abstract: Metadata about the record, such as record ID, creation date, etc.

Structs/Meta.html#/s:vV4E3db4Meta8writer.name: writerId
Structs/Meta.html#/s:vV4E3db4Meta8writer.abstract: An identifier for the writer of the record

Structs/Meta.html#/s:vV4E3db4Meta6userId.name: userId
Structs/Meta.html#/s:vV4E3db4Meta6userId.abstract: An identifier for the user of the record

Structs/Meta.html#/s:vV4E3db4Meta4typeSS.name: type
Structs/Meta.html#/s:vV4E3db4Meta4typeSS.abstract: The kind of data this record represents

Structs/Meta.html#/s:vV4E3db4Meta7create.name: created
Structs/Meta.html#/s:vV4E3db4Meta7create.abstract: The timestamp marking the record’s creation date, in ISO 8601 format

Structs/Meta.html#/s:vV4E3db4Meta12lastM.name: lastModified
Structs/Meta.html#/s:vV4E3db4Meta12lastM.abstract: The timestamp marking the record’s most recent change, in ISO 8601 format

Structs/Meta.html#/s:vV4E3db4Meta7versio.name: version
Structs/Meta.html#/s:vV4E3db4Meta7versio.abstract: An identifier for the current version of the record

Structs/RecordData.html#/s:FV4E3db10Reco.name: init(cleartext:)
Structs/RecordData.html#/s:FV4E3db10Reco.abstract: Initializer to create a structure to hold unencrypted data.

Structs/QueryResponse.html#/s:vV4E3db13Q.name: records
Structs/QueryResponse.html#/s:vV4E3db13Q.abstract: A list of records matching the provided query.

Structs/QueryResponse.html#/s:vV4E3db13Q.name: last
Structs/QueryResponse.html#/s:vV4E3db13Q.abstract: An identifier for the final result of the query.

Structs/QueryParams.html#/s:FV4E3db11Que.abstract: Initializer to specify filters for querying records

Structs/QueryParams.html#/s:FV4E3db11Que.name: next(after:)
Structs/QueryParams.html#/s:FV4E3db11Que.abstract: Advance the query beyond the given value, leaving other parameters unchanged.

Structs/Config.html#/s:vV4E3db6Config9ap.name: apiSecret
Structs/Config.html#/s:vV4E3db6Config9ap.abstract: The API secret for making authenticated calls

Structs/Config.html#/s:vV4E3db6Config10b.abstract: The base URL for the E3DB service

Structs/Config.html#/s:FV4E3db6ConfigcFT.abstract: Initializer to customize the configuration of the client. Typically, library users will

Structs/Config.html#/s:FV4E3db6ConfigcFT.name: init(loadProfile:)
Structs/Config.html#/s:FV4E3db6ConfigcFT.abstract: Load a profile from the device’s secure enclave if available.

Structs/Config.html#/s:FV4E3db6Config4sa.name: save(profile:)
Structs/Config.html#/s:FV4E3db6Config4sa.abstract: Save a profile to the device’s secure enclave if available.

Structs/KeyPair.html#/s:vV4E3db7KeyPair9.name: publicKey
Structs/KeyPair.html#/s:vV4E3db7KeyPair9.abstract: The public key from a generated keypair as a Base64URL encoded string.

Structs/KeyPair.html#/s:vV4E3db7KeyPair9.name: secretKey
Structs/KeyPair.html#/s:vV4E3db7KeyPair9.abstract: The private key from a generated keypair as a Base64URL encoded string.

Structs/KeyPair.html.name: KeyPair
Structs/KeyPair.html.abstract: A data type holding the public and private keys as

Structs/QueryParams.html.name: QueryParams
Structs/QueryParams.html.abstract: Data type to specify filters for querying records

Structs/QueryResponse.html.name: QueryResponse
Structs/QueryResponse.html.abstract: A structure to hold a response from a query operation

Structs/Meta.html.name: Meta
Structs/Meta.html.abstract: A type to hold metadata information about a given record

Structs/Record.html.name: Record
Structs/Record.html.abstract: A type that holds unencrypted values and associated metadata

Structs/ClientCredentials.html.name: ClientCredentials
Structs/ClientCredentials.html.abstract: A type that contains the registration response info

Structs/OutgoingSharingPolicy.html.name: OutgoingSharingPolicy
Structs/OutgoingSharingPolicy.html.abstract: A type to describe an existing policy for records

Structs/IncomingSharingPolicy.html.name: IncomingSharingPolicy
Structs/IncomingSharingPolicy.html.abstract: A type to describe an existing policy for records

Classes/Client.html#/s:ZFC4E3db6Client15.name: generateKeyPair()
Classes/Client.html#/s:ZFC4E3db6Client15.abstract: A helper function to create a compatible key pair for E3db operations.

Classes/Client.html#/s:FC4E3db6Client5qu.name: query(params:completion:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:FC4E3db6Client5qu.abstract: Search for records that match a given set of filters.

Classes/Client.html#/s:FC4E3db6Client5wr.name: write(type:data:plain:completion:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:FC4E3db6Client5wr.abstract: Write a record to the E3db service. This will encrypt the RecordData fields (leaving the keys as plaintext)

Classes/Client.html#/s:FC4E3db6Client4re.name: read(recordId:completion:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:FC4E3db6Client4re.abstract: Request and decrypt a record from the E3db service.

Classes/Client.html#/s:FC4E3db6Client6up.name: update(meta:newData:plain:completion:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:FC4E3db6Client6up.abstract: Replace the data and plain metadata for a record identified by its Meta. This will overwrite

Classes/Client.html#/s:FC4E3db6Client6de.name: delete(recordId:version:completion:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:FC4E3db6Client6de.abstract: Remove the record from the E3db service.

Classes/Client.html#/s:ZFC4E3db6Client8r.name: register(token:clientName:apiUrl:completion:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:ZFC4E3db6Client8r.abstract: Provide registration information to the E3db service to create a new client

Classes/Client.html#/s:ZFC4E3db6Client8r.name: register(token:clientName:publicKey:apiUrl:completion:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:ZFC4E3db6Client8r.abstract: Provide registration information to the E3db service to create a new client

Classes/Client.html#/s:FC4E3db6Client5sh.name: share(type:readerId:completion:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:FC4E3db6Client5sh.abstract: Allow another user to view and decrypt records of a given type.

Classes/Client.html#/s:FC4E3db6Client6re.name: revoke(type:readerId:completion:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:FC4E3db6Client6re.abstract: Remove a user’s access to view and decrypt records of a given type.

Classes/Client.html#/s:FC4E3db6Client18g.name: getOutgoingSharing(completion:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:FC4E3db6Client18g.abstract: Request the list of policies allowing other users to view and decrypt this client’s records.

Classes/Client.html#/s:FC4E3db6Client18g.name: getIncomingSharing(completion:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:FC4E3db6Client18g.abstract: Request the list of policies allowing this client to view and decrypt records written by other users.

Classes/Client.html.name: Client
Classes/Client.html.abstract: Main E3db class to handle data operations.
